channel.title: Need Medical Help - Blowjob trouble
channel.description:
First off, laugh at me all you want, this is annoying the hell out of me.
Alright so last night I was at a halloween party, and we got a bit bombed, and some girl I know started to give me a handjob. I'm not sure if girls understand when you pump a mans penis at 90mph, it kind of inflicts pain on my penis. She started giving me a blowjob, and I went home a few hours later and passed out. Today I realized I could not walk without a stabbing pain in my genital area.I looked into this, and found out when she gave me a handjob she did it so fast it caused a rug burn effect on my penis, and there is rug burn at the tip of my penis. I can barely walk without having a sock over my penis, and I can barely shower. I am circumsized, I'm 14, and need some serious help. My wang hurts man.

[quote=“magma, post:1, topic:241673”][quote author=SomethingToHide link=topic=316951.msg2522360#msg2522360 date=1225976870]
Thing is that saliva doesn’t last long unless it’s constantly applied. So if it was that way it would still make sense. And whenever it does start running dry, it actually gets harder (no pun intended) than just straight dry. It’s kinda sticky.
[/quote]If the pun wasn’t intended, why didn’t you just go back and change it?[/quote]

I don’t feel like coming up with another word or rewording the entire thing.

item.title: Need Medical Help - Blowjob trouble

item.description:
@SomethingToHide wrote:

[quote=“Payback Is A Bitch, post:28, topic:240631”]sigh… There’s a few things wrong with this…

If he was getting a blowjob he was getting saliva on his penis. So when she went to give him a hand job it would have been lubricated.

I can barely walk without having a sock over my penis, and I can barely shower.

Probably because you were giving yourself a handjob in a sock…?[/quote]
Thing is that saliva doesn’t last long unless it’s constantly applied. So if it was that way it would still make sense. And whenever it does start running dry, it actually gets harder (no pun intended) than just straight dry. It’s kinda sticky.
